sentences.en: "Rid Of Me" is harrowing, uneasy listening.
sentences.cn: 《弃我而去》这首歌非常伤感，听起来很晦涩。

sentences.en: A light harrowing will follow to cover the seed.
At the shelters, others told still more harrowing tales.
sentences.cn: 在妇女避难所里, 其他人也讲述了更令人发指的虐待事情.

sentences.en: Her description is powerful, harrowing and brave.
sentences.cn: 她的描述动人 、 尖锐而勇敢.

sentences.en: Her harrowing experiences brought many of the audience to tears.
sentences.cn: 她的悲惨经历让很多听众萧然泪下.

sentences.en: I didn't think I could sit through the film again. It was so harrowing and tore me apart.
sentences.cn: 我觉得自己无法把那部电影再看一遍. 故事太悲惨,把我们的心都揉碎了.

sentences.en: It is the names that make this volume harrowing, singularly distressing, exceptionally depressing.
sentences.cn: 正是这些人的名字,使得这本书让人觉得异常的痛心 、 以释怀的悲哀和特殊的阴沉.

sentences.en: It is the names that make this volume uniquely harrowing, singularly distressing, exceptionally depressing.
sentences.cn: 正是这些人的名字,使得这本书让人觉得异常的痛心 、 难以释怀的悲哀和特殊的阴沉.

sentences.en: Last night's harrowing television pictures plumbed new depths of depravity.
sentences.cn: 昨晚触目惊心的电视画面堕落到了新低。

sentences.en: The film is harrowing exploration of moral, spiritual and emotional bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 电影是关于道德 、 宗教和感情沦丧的痛苦探索.

sentences.en: The subcommittee's harrowing report was virtually ignored by the news media.
sentences.cn: 委员会令人痛心的报告完全被新闻媒体所忽略.

sentences.en: To compromise would have been more harrowing than and jungles we had to trudge trudge through.
sentences.cn: 在这点上妥协将比那些我们要跋涉的深山密林更教人痛苦.

sentences.en: To prepare ( land ) for the raising of crops, as by plowing harrowing; cultivate.
sentences.cn: 耕作通过耕耙为种植庄稼准备 ( 土地); 准备(土地 ) 耕种.

sentences.en: To see someone killed is a very harrowing experience.
sentences.cn: 目睹他人遭到杀害,是一种使人十分痛苦的感受.

sentences.en: You've had a harrowing time this past month.
sentences.cn: 过去的这个月你过得太痛苦了。

trans.tran_en: very frightening or shocking and making you feel very upset

trans.tran_cn: 耙地，使耙松( harrow的现在分词)
